info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:17AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rock Island, northern Henry and northwestern Bureau Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 617 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Geneseo, or 10 miles southeast of East Moline, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Geneseo around 625 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Atkinson, Annawan and Hooppole. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 6 and 35. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 12 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
